TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_MODIFICARI_INS_BEFORE_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN <br/> --SELECT admitere.seq_idmodif.NextVal INTO :NEW.idmodif FROM dual ; <br/> :NEW.dataoram := SYSDATE ; <br/> :NEW.operator := admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_operator ;<br/> :NEW.statiem := admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_statie ;<br/>END ;<br/>
